title: Failed to build with rodio

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
When trying to build my simple file with rodio i get this error:

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: self.appropriate_rvalue_mode(bcx.ccx()) == ByValue', ../src/librustc_trans/trans/datum.rs:767
```

And it was caused by:

```
Caused by:
  Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc /root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-0a35038f75765ae4/rodio-0.1.8/src/lib.rs --crate-name rodio --crate-type lib -g -C metadata=c75d26feaff8dfef -C extra-filename=-c75d26feaff8dfef --out-dir /home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps --emit=dep-info,link -L dependency=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps -L dependency=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps --extern time=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps/libtime-60470bfe19faf27e.rlib --extern lazy_static=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps/liblazy_static-2a4fc1ee812ca799.rlib --extern hound=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps/libhound-10ecc825f7963132.rlib --extern vorbis=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps/libvorbis-65edf5b33d9211e4.rlib --extern cpal=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/deps/libcpal-9189d7bd0826339c.rlib -Awarnings -L native=@libdir@ -L native=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/build/ogg-sys-7a1f7c9e45945cde/out -L native=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/build/vorbis-sys-4431916cf211c242/out -L native=/home/florian/Desktop/rust/crystal/target/debug/build/vorbisfile-sys-4a255b9627c465d7/out` (exit code: 101)

Expected output: Compiling without errors.
Acutal ouput: Failed to comile with unexpected panic.
```
